profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.3 File trailer - EOF
profile.description: No data can follow the last end-of-file marker except a single optional end-of-line marker as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 7.5.5.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: No data can follow the last end-of-file marker except a single optional end-of-line marker as described in ISO 32000-1:2008, 7.5.5.

error.message: Data is present after the last end-of-file marker
